title: Can't download League of Legends from the website.

embed.description: Download the game and run the League of Legends installer to continue!

body:
I cannot download League of Legends. Every time I click on the Download button (after I sellect the region and windows) it just opens 

**This webpage is not available** 

Details:
The server at l3cdn.riotgames.com can't be found, because the DNS lookup failed. DNS is the network service that translates a website's name to its Internet address. This error is most often caused by having no connection to the Internet or a misconfigured network. It can also be caused by an unresponsive DNS server or a firewall preventing Google Chrome from accessing the network.
Go to http://riotgames.com/

I've tried with Moziila and Internet Explorer but it still doesn't open. Is the server down or something ? 
Please help mates !

replies.body:
Hi Prozik,

I am sorry to hear you are experiencing this issue.

We have seen in the past if you or your ISP is having DNS issues, this can happen.

What you can do to see if it is a DNS issue is change your computers DNS settings to use a Public DNS Server such as Google.

To do this follow the instructions below, reboot your computer and then try downloading again.

- Open the Start Menu
- Open Control Panel
- Select "Network and Internet"
- Select "Network and Sharing Center"
- Select "Change Adapter Settings" on the navigation bar on the left
- Right click on your network adapter and select "Properties"
- Select "Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4)" and open Properties
- Go to the bottom of the menu and change 'Obtain DNS server address automatically,' to 'Use the following DNS server addresses:'
- Put in the following public DNS servers, one in each empty field:
- 8.8.8.8 
- 8.8.4.4
- Save your changes by selecting "Ok"
- Close all open web browsers and applications
- Press the Windows Key
- In the Search bar type command prompt
- Right click on the result and select Run as Administrator
- In the command prompt type ipconfig /flushdns and press Enter.
- Restart your computer


I hope this helps.

-ToxicHawk

That you for the reply ToxicHawk.
But I managed to download the installer using proxfree

https://de.proxfree.com/permalink.php?url=UYylBGsiU%2FAQVr5mLRAvRhkylKWssyWPecRn0AFqc9n5mzjol6TqfB9Y8pji8Fgwv%2F7UoTMjUBZgTqS2cUHFXA%3D%3D&bit=1

Thanks for the reply though !
You should remove that as soon as you no longer need it.

No problems at all.

Glad you got it working.
